sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-mobile-app', templateUrl: './mobile-app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./mobile-app.component.scss'] }) export class MobileAppComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }

Download android applicatopn

Below is the Andoid package which you can download and install on your Android phone. In this application you will find both your ticket and the ticket scanner if you are planning and holding an event via www.createyourevent.org.

Download App for Android
